arts.ttl: Red Star thrash Stuttgart to claim first Champions League win in five years
arts.sum: Watch highlights as an impressive Red Star Belgrade overcome an early setback to pick up their first Champions League win in five years with a 5-1 victory against Stuttgart.

arts.ttl: Serbian champs humble Stuttgart in Belgrade
arts.sum: To the cries of "aufwiedersehen" from the home-town crowd, Sebastian Hoeneß' VfB Stuttgart found themselves easily undone by Serbian Champions Red Star Belgrade at the Rajko Mitić Stadium on Wednesday evening.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart confirm border skirmish involving ultras
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart will contest this evening's Champions' League contest in Belgrade without some members of their traveling support.

arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: VfB Stuttgart vs. Red Star Belgrade
